CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 说；讲；讲出；讲述；告诉；告知；通知；吩咐；命令；交代；识别；区分；辨别；分辨；判断；看出；知道；说明；表明；<儿语>告发；告状；流露；显露；吐露；显示；计算；数；描述；叙述；走漏消息；泄密；产生效果

pos_mean_info_list.mean: （美）出纳员；讲述者；讲故事者；计票员

word_mean_info__list.difference: 较正式用词，通常指用明确的语言或文字着重地叙述事实，既强调内容又注重语气。
侧重于说话动作的本身，着重说话的能力而不在内容，可以是长篇大论的演讲，也可以是三言两语的交谈，甚至指简单的开口发声说话。
最普通常用词，指用语言表达思想，着重所说的内容。
普通用词，指把某事告诉或讲述给某人听，口语或书面语均可用。
着重说话的行为，常指声音的使用，突出用噪子发声。
普通用词，侧重指与人交谈时的连续说话，可指单方面较长谈话，和speak一样，着重说活动作而不侧重内容。

word_group.brief_definition: 告诉真相；告诉实情；说实情
坦率地说；说老实话；实话实说
(通常为了获利)泄露与名人的私情
我早知道了；还用你告诉我
我的主张（或意见、建议）是；你听我说

bilingual.target: 标志告诉我们该做什么。

bilingual.source: Can you tell me a bit more?
bilingual.target: 你能再多告诉我一点吗？

list.abstract: tell，英文单词，及物动词、不及物动词、名词，作及物动词时意为“告诉，说；辨别；吩咐；断定”，作不及物动词时意为“讲述；告发，泄密；识别”，作名词时意为“人名；(英、德、瑞典)特尔；(罗、意)泰尔；(阿拉伯)塔勒”。

yingyinNormal.en: And you didn't tell me? Tell you what?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你居然没有告诉我？告诉你什么？

yingyinNormal.en: But I'm here to tell you, to tell the world.
Find how to tell her.
Tell me what do you see?
Do tell us, Mr Darcy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一定要告诉我们， 达西先生。

yingyinNormal.en: You can tell them yourself.
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies》

yingyinNormal.en: You think you'll ever tell them?
How can you not tell them?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你，你怎么能不告诉他们？

yingyinNormal.en: You tell the other clans to come.
I'll tell you what he's done.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我来告诉你他干了什么。

yingyinNormal.en: Mom, why didn't you tell me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈妈，你为什么不告诉我？

yingyinNormal.en: Why wouldn't you tell Leonard?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你为什么不告诉他呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Did you or did you not tell him?
Why the hell didn't you tell me.
I want you to tell her everything.
Why don't you tell me what happened.
Who's going to tell whom about what?
When were you going to tell me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你什么时候准备告诉我?

yingyinNormal.en: No, let's not tell the mayor just yet.
Can I tell you a secret? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能告诉你个秘密吗? 不行。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 命令; 指示; 吩咐

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 有力的；有效的；显著的

word_family.mean: v. 告诉；告知；对…讲；与…说；显露；显示；断定；判断；产生不良效果；发生影响；数；计算

examination_example.sentence: And you don't have to be someone's boss to <highlight>tell</highlight> them they did an exceptional job on a particular project.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你不必成为某人的老板，告诉他们某个项目做得非常出色。

examination_example.sentence: We often feel the need to <highlight>tell</highlight> others how we feel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们常常觉得有必要告诉别人我们的感受。

examination_example.sentence: But thinking what nobody else has thought and <highlight>telling</highlight> others what they have missed may not change their views.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，想别人没有想过的，告诉别人他们错过了什么，可能并不会改变他们的观点。

examination_example.sentence: To accurately <highlight>tell</highlight> whether someone is sociable, studies show, we need at least a minute, preferably five.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究表明，要准确判断一个人是否善于交际，我们至少需要一分钟，最好是五分钟。

examination_example.sentence: Unable to <highlight>tell</highlight> whether someone really objects to behavioural ads, some may ignore a DNT signal and press on anyway.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于一些公司来说，用户到底是否真的反对行为广告是无法判断的，因此他们会忽略禁止追踪信号然后继续收集信息。

sense_info_list.zh: 命令; 指示; 吩咐

examination_example.sentence: On average, participants who followed this instruction felt better than those who had been <highlight>told</highlight> to stand or sit in silence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一般来说，比起那些被指示独自站着或坐着的人，遵循这个指示的参与者感觉更好。

examination_example.sentence: Others were <highlight>told</highlight> to plan activities and goals in much more detail, day by day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他人则被命令要更详细地计划每天的活动和目标。

examination_example.sentence: The zones do deliver some improvements to air quality, and the science <highlight>tells</highlight> us that means real health benefits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些区域确实改善了空气质量，科学表明，这真正对健康有益。

sense_info_list.en: (in the Middle East) an artificial mound formed by the accumulated remains of ancient settlements
(of an experience or period of time) have a noticeable, typically harmful, effect on someone

word_usage.usage: “告诉某人某事”可以说tell sb. sth.，也可以说tell sth. to sb.。
指“知道；看出；确切地判断”时，tell不用于进行时，表示“识别；分辨；区分”时，常用搭配tell A from B.，不用于进行时或被动语态。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 告诉；告知；对…讲；与…说；显露；显示；断定；判断；产生不良效果；发生影响；数；计算

examination_example.sentence: Some people <highlight>told</highlight> the truth instantly and instinctively.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人本能地立即说出真相。

examination_example.sentence: The number of devices you can talk to is multiplying—now you can <highlight>tell</highlight> your kitchen appliances what to do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以进行交谈的设备越来越多——现在你可以告诉你的厨房电器该怎么做。

examination_example.sentence: "And yet that happens every day in the video game world." Farley <highlight>told</highlight> reporters during a press conference Friday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在周五的新闻发布会上 Farley 对记者说: “然而这在电子游戏世界中每天都在发生。”

examination_example.sentence: She <highlight>tells</highlight> Rodriguez that it might be good for someone, but not for her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她告诉 Rodriguez，这可能对有的人有益，但对她不是。

examination_example.sentence: They were more immersed in their meals than those who weren't <highlight>told</highlight> to take photos.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们比那些没有被要求拍照的人更沉浸在饭菜中。

examination_example.sentence: However, they are sometimes unable to recognize false information on the Internet or <highlight>tell</highlight> real news stories from fake ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，他们有时无法识别互联网上的虚假信息，也无法辨别真假新闻。

word_usage.usage:
tell 作为“告诉，讲述”讲：
用在能讲完整的事物前，如story、news、truth、lie、opinion、views等时，是及物动词；用在不能讲清楚或讲完整的事物前，是不及物动词，后面要跟of或about。
每个学生都能讲述他在考试前的紧张心情。
误 Every student can tell his nervousness before the examinations.
正 Every student can tell of his nervousness before the examinations.
tell后不能直接接从句，表示“告知某人某事”时，须接双宾语即tell sb. sth.。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 坦率地说；说老实话；实话实说

examination_example.sentence: "I followed my route like I normally do," Smith <highlight>told</highlight> a reporter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 史密斯告诉记者：“我像往常一样沿着我的路线走。”

examination_example.sentence: Spokespeople from both USPS and UPS <highlight>told</highlight> me all mail is important. But some mail can be extremely sensitive and timely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国邮政和联合包裹的发言人告诉我所有的邮件都很重要。但是有些邮件可能非常敏感或很紧急。

examination_example.sentence: For instance, if the host casually acknowledges that there is a camera in the room by <highlight>telling</highlight> a story about it, that may be enough to provide an opening for a guest to say if they are uncomfortable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，如果主人通过讲述一个关于摄像头的故事随意地承认房间里有一个摄像头，这可能足以让客人说出他们是否感到不舒服。

examination_example.sentence: If a contractor is working in your home, you don't need to <highlight>tell</highlight> them that there are cameras watching.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果一个承包商在你的家里工作，你不需要告诉他们有摄像头在记录。

examination_example.sentence: Research or common sense <highlight>tells</highlight> us that the best thing to do is keep your hands, utensils and other surfaces clean.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究或常识告诉我们，最好的办法是保持手部、餐具和其他表面的清洁。

examination_example.sentence: Should you <highlight>tell</highlight> your friends, for instance, that they're being recorded while you all watch the big game together?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，你是否应该告诉你的朋友们，当你们一起观看大型比赛时，他们正在被记录下来？

examination_example.sentence: What does science <highlight>tell</highlight> us about what a few moments on the floor means for the safety of your food?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学告诉我们，在地板上的片刻对食物的安全意味着什么呢？

examination_example.sentence: A 20-year-old junior at Georgia Southern University <highlight>told</highlight> BuzzFeed News that she normally spends $ 500-$ 600 on access codes for class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乔治亚南方大学一名20岁的大三学生告诉 BuzzFeed News，她通常会花500-600美元购买上课的访问代码。

examination_example.sentence: My son was in fourth grade and <highlight>told</highlight> me, 'I'm not going to amount to anything because I have nothing to put on my resume.'
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我儿子在上四年级，他和我说，他是不会有什么成就的，因为他没有任何东西可以写在简历上。

examination_example.sentence: The city's current mayor, Luigi Brugnaro, has ridiculed UNESCO and <highlight>told</highlight> it to mind its own business, while continuing to support the cruise ship industry, which employs 5, 000 Venice residents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 威尼斯现任市长 Luigi Brugnaro 嘲笑联合国教科文组织(UNESCO)，让它管好自己的事，同时继续支持雇用了5000名威尼斯居民的游轮业。

examination_example.sentence: After all, without counting, how can someone <highlight>tell</highlight> whether there are, say, seven or eight coconuts (椰子) in a tree?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毕竟，不去数的话，怎么会有人分辨出树上有七个还是八个椰子？

examination_example.sentence: It is really difficult to <highlight>tell</highlight> if assisted living is better than a nursing home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很难判断辅助生活机构是否比疗养院更好。

examination_example.sentence: Large surveys <highlight>tell</highlight> us that American youth are not going to the cinema nearly as often as they did in the past.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大量的调查告诉我们，美国年轻人不像过去那样经常去电影院了。

examination_example.sentence: That still does not <highlight>tell</highlight> us much about what happens.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这仍然不能告诉我们发生了什么。

word_usage.usage:
tell 作为“告诉，讲述”讲：
用在能讲完整的事物前，如story、news、truth、lie、opinion、views等时，是及物动词；用在不能讲清楚或讲完整的事物前，是不及物动词，后面要跟of或about。
每个学生都能讲述他在考试前的紧张心情。
误 Every student can tell his nervousness before the examinations.
正 Every student can tell of his nervousness before the examinations.
tell后不能直接接从句，表示“告知某人某事”时，须接双宾语即tell sb. sth.。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (tell you what)我的建议是; 听我说

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 银行出纳员；叙述者；讲述者；计票人；（Teller）人名：特勒

word_family.mean: v. 告诉；告知；对…讲；与…说；显露；显示；断定；判断；产生不良效果；发生影响；数；计算

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>tells</highlight> what doctors are doing to the patient.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它告诉我们医生正在对病人做什么。

examination_example.sentence: She often <highlight>tells</highlight> me that I can be anyone I want as long as I'm confident of myself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她经常告诉我，我可以成为任何我想要成为的人，只要我对自己有信心。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>told</highlight> him how harmful plastic could be to the environment and asked him to consider using more eco-friendly options.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我告诉他塑料对环境的危害有多大，并希望他考虑使用更环保的选择。

examination_example.sentence: Preparing others for a conversation of fun is as good as <highlight>telling</highlight> a joke yourself when showing your sense of humor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让别人为一场有趣的谈话做准备，就像你在展示自己的幽默感时给自己讲笑话一样。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>told</highlight> the story to the class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我把这个故事讲给全班同学听。

examination_example.sentence: So Chris, <highlight>tell</highlight> us a bit about yourself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Chris，跟我们说说你自己。

examination_example.sentence: They said he's bright, and that he's starting to learn how to <highlight>tell</highlight> time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们说他很聪明，而且他开始学习如何看时间。

examination_example.sentence: Departing from the Cannery: <highlight>Tell</highlight> time upon request.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从罐头厂出发：按要求报时。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Tell</highlight> Kate to stop.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 叫凯特停下来。

examination_example.sentence: If I were you, I would <highlight>tell</highlight> her to stop.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我是你，我会叫她停下来。

examination_example.sentence: If you ever get the impression that your dog can "<highlight>tell</highlight>" whether you look content or annoyed, you may be onto something.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你有这样的印象，你的狗狗可以“分辨”出你是满意还是生气，那你可能是有道理的。

examination_example.sentence: I was so nervous that I could hardly <highlight>tell</highlight> which direction was left.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我紧张得几乎分不清哪个方向是左。

sense_info_list.zh: (tell you what)我的建议是; 听我说

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Tell</highlight> you what: I'll be calling Jim late this week anyway, so I'll mention it to him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 听我说：反正我本周晚些时候会给吉姆打电话，所以我会告诉他。

examination_example.sentence: You can <highlight>tell</highlight> this by café life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以从咖啡馆生活中看出这一点。

examination_example.sentence: It is too early to <highlight>tell</highlight> if the calves will make good candidates to be returned to protected areas of the wild.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在判断这些幼崽是否是返回野生保护区的好候选者还为时过早。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 银行出纳员；叙述者；讲述者；计票人；（Teller）人名：特勒
adj. 有力的；有效的；显著的

word_family.mean: v. 告诉；告知；对…讲；与…说；显露；显示；断定；判断；产生不良效果；发生影响；数；计算

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 告诉真相；告诉实情；说实情

examination_example.sentence: The middle school boy can <highlight>tell</highlight> traditional Chinese stories in English.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个中学生能用英语讲中国传统故事。

examination_example.sentence: Instead of saying "I <highlight>told</highlight> you so", my mom always let me work things out myself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我妈妈总是让我自己解决问题，而不是说“我早就告诉过你了”。

examination_example.sentence: I remembered the stories he <highlight>told</highlight> me of how he fed the monkeys when he was a kid.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我记得他给我讲的故事，关于他小时候如何喂猴子。

examination_example.sentence: The study was to <highlight>tell</highlight> the importance of handwriting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究旨在说明手写的重要性。

examination_example.sentence: There are about a hundred things in the museum to see: clocks which have been <highlight>telling</highlight> the time for six hundred years, Roman money...
examination_example.sentence_trans: 博物馆里大约有100样东西可以欣赏：600年来一直显示时间的钟，罗马货币...

examination_example.sentence: Tears (眼泪) in your eyes <highlight>tell</highlight> others that you are sad.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你眼中的泪水向别人显露你很难过。

examination_example.sentence: If something happens to your ears, you might have a hard time <highlight>telling</highlight> different tastes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你的耳朵出了什么问题，你可能很难分辨出不同的味道。

examination_example.sentence: The radio telescope is like an ear, listening to <highlight>tell</highlight> meaningful radio messages from white noise in the universe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 射电望远镜就像一只耳朵，从宇宙内的白噪声中分辨出有意义的无线电信息。

examination_example.sentence: They were <highlight>telling</highlight> who had cancer, and they were also saying who didn't.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们判断谁得了癌症，以及谁没有得癌症。

examination_example.sentence: What can we <highlight>tell</highlight> from the story?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从这个故事中我们能判断出什么？

word_usage.usage:
tell 作为“告诉，讲述”讲：
用在能讲完整的事物前，如story、news、truth、lie、opinion、views等时，是及物动词；用在不能讲清楚或讲完整的事物前，是不及物动词，后面要跟of或about。
每个学生都能讲述他在考试前的紧张心情。
误 Every student can tell his nervousness before the examinations.
正 Every student can tell of his nervousness before the examinations.
tell后不能直接接从句，表示“告知某人某事”时，须接双宾语即tell sb. sth.。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 最普通用词，指用语言表达思想，着重所说的具体内容。
侧重于说话的动作本身，着重说话的能力而非内容。可指长篇演讲，也可指三言两语的交谈，或指简单的开口发声说话。
较正式用词，通常指用明确的语言或文字着重地叙述事实，既强调内容又注重语气。
普通用词，多指与人交谈时的连续说话，也可指单方面的较长谈话，和speak一样，着重说活的动作而不侧重内容。
普通用词，指将某事向某人讲述或转述，有时含嘱托、命令之意，口语或书面语均可用。
